column2: Verify Product with No Description
column8: No description area is shown OR empty state handled gracefully.

column2: Verify Product with Very Long Title
column4: Product has extremely long title (500+ chars).
column8: Title is displayed without breaking layout (truncated or wrapped).

column2: Verify Product with No SKUs
column4: Product exists but has no SKUs configured.
column8: Error message or fallback is shown; Add to Cart disabled.

column2: Verify SKU with No Price
column4: SKU exists but has no price set.
column8: No price or error message is shown; Add to Cart disabled.

column2: Verify Rapid Add to Cart Clicks
column4: Customer clicks Add to Cart multiple times rapidly.
column8: Only one product is added to cart OR duplicate prevention is in place.

column2: Verify Page Refresh After Add to Cart
column4: Product has been added to cart.
column8: Cart state is preserved; Product still in cart after refresh.

column2: Verify Product Data Changes While Viewing
column4: Merchant updates product while customer viewing.
column8: PDP either refreshes automatically OR user sees updated data on next action.

column2: Verify SKU Availability Change During Add to Cart
column4: SKU goes out of stock between viewing and adding.
column8: System prevents adding out-of-stock product OR shows error message.

column2: Scenario Title
column8: Expected Result

column8: Page is fully responsive

column8: Page is fully responsive

column8: Page is fully responsive

column8: Page is fully responsive

column2: Verify Quantity Selector Accessibility
column8: Quantity selector is accessible via keyboard and screen readers.

column2: Verify Add to Cart Button Accessibility
column4: Add to Cart button is visible.
column8: Add to Cart button is accessible via Tab key and activatable with Enter.

column2: Verify SKU Selector Accessibility
column8: SKU selection is accessible via keyboard navigation.

column2: Verify PDP Page Load Performance
column8: Page loads within acceptable time frame (goal: <3 seconds).
